reviews.review: This game is kind of cringe not gonna lie. I especially think it really sucks because they made it free and gave the ones that bought the game basically nothing...
Me ha gustado la complejidad estratégica del juego

Dangerzone is the biggest piece of shit in the battleroyale history. And  valve made operation missions out of it. Yeah you guessed right its an even bigger piece of shit. And now lets talk about Cs:go in general. The major part of the community is very toxic and loads players can cheat freely because the game is free now so  apart from ranked they can play with prime accounts. And valve is not going to do anything about it because they bring loads of money and even more if they buy the prime account status. The only thing that matters to valve is skins and to get the most money out of this game..
Give's me complete cancer but I can't leave it.
Fun game, but many toxic players.
Very good game! Highly suggest buying prime for optimal experience !
Nice game  but a little bit toxic community :)
